name: While 1
description:
It's dangerous to go alone, take this are the last words you remember when you wake up here. What are you left with? A menu that you can open with M, really strange ... You should not stay here and start exploring this dangerous world!

How to use your menu?

Press M to open your menu, you'll see the following window! Drag and drop the black block in you're routine, it'll make your robot processor execute the indicated actions continuously. To execute some actions, place these in the blue slots. Don't forget to "Do nothing" if you don't want an action to be done.  Your inner processor seems to be defectious, open and close the menu to reboot yourslef, good old method but it can help. You can close the menu with M.

You will encounter many enemies:

  • Ordifrappeur: this strong computer will jump toward you whenever it sees you ! You should be able to kill it if you automatically shoot when you jump in front of it.
  • Tronçobot: this robot is faster! When you are surrounded, it becomes overwhelming. Don't hesitate to automatically jump if they are too close, it'll help you to go around.

Controls :

  • Move with Arrows/WASD
  • Shoot with CTRL/Mouse 1
  • Open the reprogramming menu with M

Credits : Unity standard assets (for the player design and some behaviour and camera scripts),  generic run n gun assets (for our world design), the enemies design are made by Nelson (one of us).

Special thanks to the Unity Particle System.
